name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms Ⅴ with Power Up Kit / 三國志Ⅴ with パワーアップキット
description: Released in 1995, "Romance of the Three Kingdoms Ⅴ with Power Up Kit" is the enhanced version of the 5th release in the Romance of the Three Kingdoms series. It places more focus on the common people with "Fame," which was an indicator of how well the Ruler grasped the hearts of the people.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10(*Japanese Ver. only) Processor: 1GHz over Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 800x600 pixel over DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: 44KHz/16bit
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10(*Japanese Ver. only) Processor: 1GHz over Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 800x600 pixel over DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: 44KHz/16bit
